statement: Running gpt-4.1 for rubric and scoring requires OPENAI_API_KEY in the Convex environment; missing keys will block batch submissions.
rationale: OpenAI batch adapter throws if OPENAI_API_KEY is absent.
keyAssumptions: gpt-4.1 routes through the OpenAI batch adapter
validationCriteria: OpenAI batch submit succeeds without key errors
critiquePoints: If provider routing changes, the required key may differ
questions: Are we using OpenAI batch or another provider for gpt-4.1?
